itunes:summary: Learning is a critical part of SRE practices. Taylor Dolezal shares how learning impacted his work as an engineer at Disney and his new role as a Senior Developer Advocate at HashiCorp.
itunes:subtitle: Learning is a critical part of SRE practices. Taylor Dolezal shares how learning impacted his work as an engineer at Disney and his new role as a Senior Developer Advocate at HashiCorp.
